attributes.action: Do more to prevent the spread of Coronavirus (COVID-19) in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We strongly urge the UK government to consider their options in containing a virus of which we still know very little about and have no cure for.  This virus is mutating, reactivating and not only affecting the elderly. The current death rate is 4 %, with admissions into Intensive Care at 10 %, but still early days. Without extreme measures we will see considerable loss of life not only from COVID-19, but those who require emergency treatment from other life threatening conditions.
attributes.background:
1.Close our borders completely to prevent travel in and out of the UK 2.Put the UK into a 14 day minimum lock-down to allow those that are infected to present, be treated and recover
3.Ensure our healthcare workers have the necessary supplies, training, equipment to give patients the best outcomes
